title.rendered: Wiener Neustadt East Airport in Wiener Neustadt East, Austria

content.rendered:
Wiener Neustadt East Airport in Wiener Neustadt East , Austria Address / Phone / Email / Location / Website

Address : LOAN – Flugplatz Wiener Neustadt Ost
N.A. Otto-Strabe 5
2700 Wiener Neustadt

Phone : +43 2622 26700 1357

Email id: NA

Hours: NA

Wiener Neustadt East Airport Official website: http://www.loan-airport.at/

Direction: View direction here

IATA code: 

ICAO code: LOAN
